DOC.brief_summary: 12-SMI-2014 post-market , randomise , pilot study identify rate difference patient experience two different type Spinal Cord Stimulator device routinely use treat chronic pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Pilot Study Assess Differences Stimulation Induced Paresthesia Between 2 Spinal Cord Stimulation Systems
